articles.title: IND vs NEP | Twitter reacts to lively Rohit Sharma telling Jadeja off after his plan earns India wicket - SportsCafe
articles.description: Not often does a master of his craft such as Ravindra Jadeja get an earful on the field but an exception can always be made for the amusing personality that is Rohit Sharma. The Indian skipper was quick to get on the spinner's case on Monday after his strateg…
articles.content: Jadeja was up against opposition skipper Rohit Paudel and pushed in delivery slightly outside the line at back of a length. Paudel attempted to play the ball through covers but got a thick outside ed… [+438 chars]

articles.author: SportsCafe Desk
articles.title: Rohan Bopanna and Matthew Ebden enter US Open quarters - SportsCafe
articles.description: Rohan Bopanna of India and Matthew Ebden of Australia defeated Julian Cash and Henry Patten in a gruelling three-set match to get to the men's doubles quarterfinals at the US Open.
articles.content: The British team of Cash and Patten were defeated 6-4, 6-7(5), 7-6(10-6) by the sixth-seeded Indo-Australian combination at the Arthur Ashe Stadium on Sunday after a gruelling two hours and 22 minute… [+150 chars]
